title: Zumba Basic Steps Breakdown and Tips for Beginners

title: Hard Poses Made Easy | Intermediate Yoga With Tara Stiles
summary: Led by inspirational teacher and 'Yoga Rebel' Tara Stiles, The Yoga Solution is a weekly series that offers fun and simple ways for yoga to help improve your life. Whether you're new to yoga or have been practicing for years, Tara's easy-to-follow and approachable manner will guide you towards living well every day.

title: 10 Simple Exercises To Lose Weight At Home

title: Planks for Beginners: How to do a Plank
summary: The plank is a great core exercise that doesn't involve doing any crunches. In fact, the basic plank doesn't involve moving at all. This is referred to as an isometric exercise.
